content: Good morning. I signed up for a session later today but my schedule has changed. I’d like to switch to an earlier time. Can I just sign up for that shift and change my name in the Zoom meeting?
Yes. Please update the Google sheet and also post in the chat captain channel the shift that is now available
I’ve never added anything to a Google sheet. Can you direct me to that? I’m about to sign on for my shift.

At the training I attended last weekend, the host mentioned that there is a need for Data Captains. I ended up in a the Facilitator group and shadowed a shift this morning. I’d like to get more info and or training if necessary to volunteer as a Data Captain. Can you help me with the first step (s)? Thanks!
It sounds to me like you are ready to sign up for a shift.  Are you looking for the where/how to do that?
